data.title: After Leaving Senate, Snowe Is Still 'Fighting For Common Ground'
data.meta_description: In a new book, former U.S. Sen. Olympia Snowe explores how to fix the gridlock in Congress. Earlier this year, the Republican from Maine left the Senate out of frustration with the partisan stalemate. "It has to change, for the country," she says. "People deserve ... better representation."
